// Use the following commands in power shell (from this directory).

Invoke-WebRequest -Uri https://www.nuget.org/api/v2/package/Microsoft.Direct3D.D3D12/1.602.0 -OutFile agility.zip
Expand-Archive agility.zip DirectXAgilitySDK

// Note, that the only files needed are 'D3D12Core.dll, d3d12SDKLayers.dll and d3dconfig.exe'. Other files
// may be deleted (applicable for arm, arm64, win32 and x64 versions).
